name: DataSourceStats

properties.name: currentPage
properties.rawdescription: The number of the current page.

properties.name: currentPageSize
properties.description: The number of items currently shown in the list view, a.k.a. current page (what the user sees on screen).
properties.rawdescription: The number of items currently shown in the list view, a.k.a. current page (what the user sees on screen).

properties.name: filteredSize
properties.description: The number of items after filtering applied to the whole dataset (subset).
properties.rawdescription: The number of items after filtering applied to the whole dataset (subset).

properties.name: firstPageSize
properties.description: The number of items on the first page.
properties.rawdescription: The number of items on the first page.

properties.name: nextPage
properties.rawdescription: The number of the next page.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The real grand total number of items (the whole dataset).
properties.rawdescription: The real grand total number of items (the whole dataset).

description: Describes an object with data source statistics.
rawdescription: Describes an object with data source statistics.
